topic.title: How to Select a Language (HTML5 and CSS)

body.p: There are two ways to switch the labels to a specific language:

ul.li: Alter the DITA maps and/or topics to have the xml:lang attribute set on the root element with one of the supported values (i.e. fr, de, zh, ru).
If changing the files is not an option, you can alter the value of the default.language transformation parameter to the desired language code.
